Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of the remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393480) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393480)
